description.value: Your performances aren't just well-known, they're famous across the land and beyond. Your ability to make people believe the stories you perform has taken on supernatural power. You gain the ability to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fabricated Truth] once per day as an occult innate spell.

value.value: Acrobat, Celebrity, Dandy, or Gladiator Dedication
